alternative_title: Contact information for employment tribunals enquiries
body:
$!Get general information about how the tribunal process works.$! 

$C
**Employment Tribunal public enquiry line**

**Telephone:** 08457 959 775  
**Minicom:** 0845 757 3722  
Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm

$C

The helpline can tell you how make a claim to an [employment tribunal](/employment-tribunals "Find out how to make a claim and what type of claims are made") but you won't be able to get legal advice.
